title: GameMaker offers free version as ‘gift’ to developers
description:
2D game engine GameMaker has announced massive pricing changes in what its head calls a “gift” to its loyal user base. Starting today, GameMaker will be free to use for noncommercial, non-console game development projects in a move CEO Russell Kay says is meant to “do the opposite” of recent unpopular decisions by competitors like...
